AI Description: xtrans is a general-purpose transducer-based approach for defining translations between various formats and data representations. It provides a flexible framework for specifying bidirectional transformations between different data structures.
Core Features: Define Bidirectional Translations Between Different Data Formats, Supports Various Data Representations & Structures, Flexibility In Specifying Transformations, General-Purpose Transducer-Based Approach
General Tags: Data Transformation, Format Conversion, Transducer-Based Tool
